Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite

Class SpriteEntity

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.YaegerEntity
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.sprite.SpriteEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, EventInitiator, GameNode, Rotatable, Placeable, Removeable, SceneChild, Initializable, com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer, DimensionsProvider, TimerListProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicSpriteEntity
public abstract class SpriteEntity
extends YaegerEntity
implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer
A SpriteEntity is a YaegerEntity that is represented by an Image. When creating a SpriteEntity, the Size of the image must be passed through the constructor. After construction, this Size can not be changed.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteEntity

      protected SpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D location, Size size)
      Instantiate a new SpriteEntity for a given image.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      location - the initial Coordinate2D of this SpriteEntity
      size - The bounding box of this SpriteEntity

    • SpriteEntity

      protected SpriteEntity​(java.lang.String resource, Coordinate2D location, Size size, int frames)
      Instantiate a new SpriteEntity for a given image.
      Parameters:
      resource - the url of the image file. Relative to the resources folder
      location - the initial Coordinate2D of this SpriteEntity
      size - The bounding box of this SpriteEntity
      frames - The number of frames the image contains. By default the first frame is loaded

    • setCurrentFrameIndex

      public void setCurrentFrameIndex​(int index)
      Set the current frame index of the Sprite image.
      Parameters:
      index - the index that should be shown. The index is zero based and the frame modulo index will be shown

    • setPreserveAspectRatio

      public void setPreserveAspectRatio​(boolean preserveAspectRatio)
      Preserve the aspect ration of the width and height of this SpriteEntity.
      Parameters:
      preserveAspectRatio - true if the ratio should be preserved, false otherwise
